modName: Beautiful Character Face Preset - Saved Game
summary: Some people find it's hard to create a good looking female character, so I've decide to share this one with you, dear Nexus users!
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center]

[center][img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/921x672q90/538/Lpl6lE.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1319x67q90/674/5n4NnB.jpg[/img]


[size=4][font=Georgia]O'Ren Ishii is a female Breton level 1. Her name come from the fabulous movie ''Kill Bill''.
[/font][font=Georgia]This is not a reproduction of the character seen in the movie, I just found the name cool.[/font]
[font=Georgia]When you will load the saved game, you will find yourself out of the first dungeon.[/font]

[/size][font=Georgia][size=4]You will have in your inventory all the stuff you can pick in the first dungeon.[/size]
[/font][font=Georgia][size=4]See the note at the end of the page for more details.
[/size][size=3]
[/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=Trebuchet MS][b][img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1319x67q90/537/cdFrVj.jpg[/img]


[/b][/font][size=4][font=Georgia]You need the official Skyrim 1.9.32.0.8 patch.
You also have to download some (great) mods to get the same result as in the above screenshots.[/font]
[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f1c232]ALL CREDITS GO TO THEIR RESPECTIVE AUTHORS ![/color][/font]
[font=Georgia]I just create the character itself.[/font][/size][/center]

[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#cc0000][size=4][b] WARNING![/b][/size] [/color][size=3]The following mods may contain nudity.
[/size][/font]

[list][*][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/][size=4]Skyrim Script Extender 1.7.1 (SKSE)[/size][/url][size=3][/size] [size=3][i][font=Georgia]by[/font][font=Trebuchet MS] [/font][/i][font=Georgia][i]Ian Patterson, Stephen Abel and Paul Connelly[/i][/font][/size][/*]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4] [/size][i][size=3]by Expired[/size][/i][/font][/*]
[*][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26113/?]Better Female by Bella - Natural Edition[/url][font=Trebuchet MS] [/font][/size][size=3][font=Georgia][i]by zzjay [/i]    [/font][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#cc0000]Download only the Normalmaps[/color][/font][/size][/*]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25588/?]Women Of Skyrim female face textures and COMPANIONS[/url][/size][/font][font=Georgia] [i][size=3]by zzjay[/size][/i][/font][/*]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13076/?]Cute Eyes[/url][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4] [/size][i][size=3]by tktk[/size][/i][/font][/*]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221/?]KS Hairdos - 265[/url][/size][/font][font=Georgia] [i][size=3]by [/size][/i][/font][font=Georgia][size=3][i]Kalilies Shocky and Stealthic Khaos[/i][/size][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Georgia][size=3][i]
[/i][/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#cc0000][size=4][b] Note : [/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Look what body mod you have and download the correct file for it.[/size][/font]

[b][color=#cc0000][size=4] Note : [/size][/color][/b][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS]I've took the eye brows from [/font][font=Georgia][i]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies[/i][/font][font=Trebuchet MS] mod bellow. Download manually.
[/font][/size]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][center][/center][/size][/font][center][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#fce5cd][b][u]

[/u][img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1319x67q90/540/QAPZ4P.jpg[/img]


[/b][/color][/font][size=4]I  highly recommend you download these (awesome) mods for even more customization.[/size][/center][center][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f1c232][size=4]ALL CREDITS GO TO THEIR RESPECTIVE AUTHORS ![/size][/color][/font][/center]

[color=#cc0000][size=4][b] WARNING![/b][/size] [/color][size=3]The following mods may contain nudity.[/size]


[list][*][size=4][font=Trebuchet MS][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url][/font] [/size][font=Georgia][size=3][i]by Caliente[/i][/size][/font]
[/*]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/size][/font][/url][i][font=Trebuchet MS] [/font][size=3]by Caliente[/size][/i][/*]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12273/?]Caliente's Vanilla Outfits for CBBE[/url][/size][/font][i] [font=Georgia][size=3]by Caliente[/size][/font][/i][/*]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/url] [/size][/font][font=Georgia] [i][size=3]by xp32[/size][/i][/font]
[/*]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url][/size][/font][i] [/i][font=Georgia][size=3][i]by[/i] [i]CaBaL- EmeraldReign-the AMB team[/i][/size][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Georgia][size=3][i]
[/i][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=2]
[/size][/font][center][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#fce5cd][b][img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1319x67q90/538/eSvJ2j.jpg[/img]


[/b][/color][/font][size=4][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f1c232]Manual Install Only[/color][/font]

[font=Georgia]Simple : Just drag & drop the file to your saves folder (C:\Users\YourName\Documents\My Games\Skyrim\Saves)
[/font][/size]
[/center][center][/center][font=Georgia][size=3]
[/size][/font][center][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#fce5cd][b][img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1319x67q90/913/SRIymQ.jpg[/img]


[/b][/color][/font][size=4][font=Georgia]You can use my save just to have a starting point.
Feel free to change the things you want (name, haircuts, etc).

Open the character creation menu : press the ~ button and type [i]showracemenu. [/i]Voila!


[/font][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f1c232]Please, tell me in the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58872/?tab=4&&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D58872%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D2176649&pUp=1]posts section[/url] if anythings wrong with the file.[/color][/font][/size][/center]
[center][/center]

[center][img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1319x67q90/540/6Biqx4.jpg[/img][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#fce5cd][b]


[/b][/color][/font][size=3][url=http://bethsoft.com/en-gb]Bethesda Softworks[/url] for this beautiful game
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481/?]expired6978[/url] for the incredible [i][font=Georgia]RaceMenu[/font][/i] mod
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2689072/?]zzjay[/url] for his great mods and textures
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3841389/?]tktk1[/url] for the pretty [i][font=Georgia]Cute Eyes[/font][/i] mod
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4559665/?]Kalilies[/url] for the heavy [i][font=Georgia]KS Haidos[/font][/i] mod[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686/?]Caliente[/url] for the beautiful body mod and tools
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/183089/?]XP32[/url] for his excellent work
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/571605/?]CaBaL120[/url] for the amazing textures he made

Nexus Community for all their work and support[/size][/center]
author: JackHerer93
